content: ***want to receive special discount codes and be the first to know about new pattern releases sign up for my newsletter here 1 *** ** instagram 2 ** ** website 3 ** ** youtube 4 ** **free pattern ** the weekend shorty socks are a fun easy joyful knit that can be whipped up quickly a great stash-buster these socks are designed with color play in mind the pattern includes detailed instructions for six sizes from toddler to adult ***materials*** *approximately **22 29 36 43 50 57 ** grams / **88 116 144 172 200 228 ** yards / **80 106 132 157 183 208 ** meters total of fingering weight yarn *for all sizes you will need less than 200 yards / 183 meters of the mc which makes up the body of the sock and less than 10 yards / 9 meters each of your contrast colors i used 6 different contrast colors per sock * *us size 1 2 25 mm knitting needles * a tapestry needle for weaving in ends ***sizes*** *the measurements below refer to the circumference of the ball of your foot not the finished sock * **toddler** 4-5 / 10-13 cm **kid** 5-6 / 13-15 cm **s** 7 /18 cm **m** 8 /20 cm **l** 9 /23 cm **xl** 10 /25 cm ***gauge*** 40 sts over 4 10 cm and 28 row knit in stockinette in the round and blocked *i m a very tight knitter i typically get 10 sts in an 1 / 3cm of stockinette if you get between 8-10 sts per 1 / 3cm knit your standard size if you get less than that per inch size down * find me on instagram @summer lee knits 5 1 https //shy-queen-11066 myflodesk com/ev9st9kqal 2 https //www instagram com/summer lee knits/ 3 https //www summerleedesignco com 4 https //www youtube com/channel/uceksmpjh7dggw7r4gvpmnhq/videos 5 https //www instagram com/summer lee knits/ hl=en
